#summary Details of the Browser class that shows a list of albums

[http://pyslimp3.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/AlbumListBrowser.jpg]

= Introduction =

The AlbumListBrowser class allows the user to browse a set of Album objects. The display shows the artist name (*Aimee Mann*) of the current album on the first line, and the album name (*@#%&`*`! Smilers*), album index (*2*) and album count (*374*) on the second.

== Keys Supported ==

|| UP || Show the next album in the collection ||
|| DOWN || Show the previous album in the collection ||
|| RIGHT || Show a TrackListBrowser for the tracks associated with the current album ||
|| REC || Append all of the tracks of the current album to the target playlist ||
|| PLAY || Play the tracks of the current album, starting with the first track ||
|| LEFT || Return to the parent level (eg. ArtistListBrowser or GenreListBrowser) ||
